name: @1mangesh1/dev-skills
description: A collection of AI agent skills for development, compliance, and security workflows

hipaa-guardian.description: HIPAA compliance, PHI/PII detection, healthcare formats

secret-scanner.description: Secret detection, API keys, credentials (50+ providers)

gh-cli.description: GitHub CLI for PRs, issues, releases, actions

git-hooks.description: Pre-commit hooks with Husky, lint-staged, pre-commit

mcp-setup.description: MCP server configuration for Claude integration

jq-yq.description: JSON/YAML manipulation with jq and yq

curl-http.description: API testing with curl and HTTPie

ssh-config.description: SSH keys, config, tunnels, jump hosts

makefile.description: GNU Make patterns for project automation

pytest.description: Python testing with fixtures, mocking, coverage

jest-vitest.description: JavaScript/TypeScript testing with Jest and Vitest

github-actions.description: CI/CD workflows, matrix builds, caching, secrets

sql-migrations.description: Database migrations with Prisma, Drizzle, raw SQL

aws-cli.description: AWS CLI mastery, profiles, S3, EC2, Lambda

terraform.description: Infrastructure as code, modules, state management

python-env.description: Poetry, Pipenv, venv, pyenv, uv environment management

regex.description: Regular expression patterns, testing, common recipes

nginx.description: Web server config, reverse proxy, SSL/TLS

redis.description: Caching patterns, CLI, data structures, pub/sub

vim-motions.description: Vim keybindings, motions, text objects for editors

code-review.description: Code review checklists, PR review patterns

lint-format.description: ESLint, Prettier, Ruff, Black, editorconfig setup

env-debug.description: Debugging PATH, permissions, env vars, configs
